name: Sea Shells on the Sea Shore
name_original: Sea Shells on the Sea Shore
description:
How to Play
  1. Help a Red Speedo dog collect the sea shells on the sea shore.
  2. Help a Green Speedo dog collect the sea shells on the sea shore.
  3. Help a Pink Speedo dog collect the sea shells on the sea shore.
  4. Help a Blue Speedo dog collect the sea shells on the sea shore.

Collect all sea shells on the sea shore, OK!.

Press "A","S","D","F"  button as a wave!

of Tab on Red,Green,Pink,Blue Speedo Dog for Mobile.
